mapper.insert: insert ignore into EnterInfo(EnterID, Certifier, CertifyOrg, CertifyPlace, CertifyYear , OperationRange, EnterRemark) VALUES ( #{enterInfo.EnterID}, #{enterInfo.Certifier}, #{enterInfo.CertifyOrg}, #{enterInfo.CertifyPlace}, #{enterInfo.CertifyYear}, #{enterInfo.OperationRange}, #{enterInfo.EnterRemark} )
